NOTES:
Ok this is a rip of a dvdr i found.....and it's the best source to date by far
This release contains the normal "A" watermark throughout the film towards the top left corner.
The picture for a cam is really good like most release by anton studios.....the only problem ,but i think it's the way it's
been made is,alot of the footage seems to have a pale green effect to it and then there's parts which seemed to be "normal"....
Now i haven't seen or watched any trailors for this so i can't say for 100%......apart from that it's all good.
The audio is pretty decent and better then some of the direct (or so called) audio's we've been getting.

WORK DONE:
First thing was to remove the menu and spanish audio track ......
After it was a case of fixing the video up a bit more,to start with there was a chair that kept appearing throughout in the bottom right corner so
i cropped the best i could to hide that and also the camera drops down slightly to line a slanting black line at the top so i cropped that aswell.
Then onto the video ......got to be honest was a bit stuck on what to do because of the green tint to it.....so i decided to filter the parts that was
normal first and then i just slightly reduced the green a effect a touch.
For this i needed to increase the contrast alot and also the lum.....added a touch more chroma and gamma and also lowered down the rgb black
base to reduce any glares.
And finally used a contour filter on a wide search to make it even sharper ;-)

Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON'T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME
HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5'S....BECAUSE THEY DON'T!!!!!

Anyway enjoy the movie,it's free!!!!
